commits.author: Michael Sheets
commits.body: These items are being moved to the Diff bundle and having their scope widened to work outside of Subversion repositories.

commits.author: Michael Sheets
commits.body: This was originally in the Bundle Support bundle but was only ever used in this single command.

commits.author: Allan Odgaard
commits.summary: With no selection we update entire project
commits.body:
Previously we would fallback to current document, when nothing was selected in the file browser.

This seemed consistent with the Add, Remove, and Revert commands, though for updating, we generally do want to batch update, and limiting a command to current file can easily be done using <kbd class='keyEquivalent'>⌃⌘R</kbd> (select current document).

commits.author: Michael Sheets
commits.summary: Switch to using 'Hair Space' for menu selection control
commits.body: This changes the previously zero-width whitespace character used to control the menu item selected when typing a C with the menu open. The previous workaround became very visible on Yosemite, a hair space isn't absolutely invisible but almost so.

commits.author: Michael Sheets
commits.body: This corrects a issue with a missing library on Yosemite.

commits.author: Yuan
commits.summary: Correct order of params when using TM_SVN_DIFF_CMD to diff urls
